Hero Title:
Looking for a smarter
Virtual Phone System?
Hero Message: Fancyy is a cloud-based communications solution for all kinds of businesses. We designed Fancyy to empower our users with the data and analytics they need. Pay whatever you think is fair!
Cancel anytime: Looking to add super-powers to your phone service?
Feature Message: Make it easy to provide your business powerful phone service. No complex hardware to install or mantain. Fancyy is simple to use and manage, requiring no technical expertise
Powerful Message: Your cloud-based phone system uses state-of-the-art telecom Voice and SMS technology
Credible Message: Make your business sound big with a fancyy phone system
Easy Message: Works on a new or existing phone line. With a guided setup, account management, and reporting tools, you'll be ready in no time!
Smart Message: Think of it like AI for your phone. Tons of free features to make sure you optimize every call
Data Driven Message: We will provide you with your caller's data for everyday use, internal analytics or marketing purposes (CRM, SMS, Auto-Reply, etc.)
Affordable Message: We offer a generous all-in-one solution at the best price on the market. Feel free to shop around!
Get Started Message: Pick a number of your choice or keep the one you have, we'll help you forward it to Fancyy
Customize Message: Use a standard greeting & extensions template or create your own call-flow. You can record custom greetings or use a Fancyy professional
Record greetings: Record greetings or use recording service
Record greetings Message: Create your custom main greeting for auto attendant
Smarten Message: Daily, Weekly, and/or Monthly call reports and data insights on all your calls
Take Action Message: Receive and send SMS to your customers, define marketing strategies, and never miss a call again.
Add extensions Message: Choose & customize extensions to forward your calls anywhere to your home, your office or your mobile
Receive reports Message: Monthly Weekly or Daily call reports and data insights on your calls
How It Works Message: The fanciest call management solution for small, medium & large businesses
Quote1: We are a people company. We are a family company. Like you, our mission is to connect people, therefore the needs of our clients come first
Quote2: We are proud of our customers and their growth, and would love to work with you
Testimony1: Fancyy has allowed me to increase my sales all from the comfort of my home. As a start up, having the ability to handle multiple calls and direct them has been truly useful
Testimony2: Fancyy is amazing! It has allowed my new business to sound more professional and fancyy for our customers
Testimony3: Fancyy is easy to set up and customize and the customer service has been amazing!
Testimony4: The call reports have allowed our company to follow up on all incoming leads! Highly recommended
About us message: Fancyy is an all-in-one virtual phone service featuring auto-attendant, professional greetings, call data and a simple web interface that allows you to easily manage all of your business communications and data without hardware. Stay connected to your customers and understand what is relevant to your business
Plans and Features Message: We keep things Fancyy but simple. All of our plans include the same features, but you can save money based on the length of the subscription.
Feature Phone Calls Message: Get a Fancyy number or keep your existing line with unlimited extensions
Feature Text-able Message: All of our #'s are SMS enabled for smarter communication
Feature Auto-Reply SMS Message: text callers when you miss a call and/or send links to your menu, survey, app or delivery service, etc.
Feature Data Driven Message: Get insight into your calls, your callers, and your business
Feature Call Queues Message: Never miss a call again! Voicemail to E-mail just in case
Feature Auto-Play Message: Customize voice prompts (in any language) for FAQS: hours of operation, address, COVID protocols et.
Feature Conference Call Room Message: We'll throw in a free conference call line, because you never know
Feature E-Fax Message: Let your customers send you a fax by simply by pressing a button
Feature Better Call Management Message: Route calls to the right person
contactUsErrorMessage: An error has ocurred, please try again
checkoutTestimonial: Like you, our mission is to connect people, therefore the needs of our clients come first
User created messsage: An email has been sent to the User to complete their registration
Business hours description: Choose your business hours! (these will be the times your PBX message will be heard)
Downtime hours description: Hours where your business is not working
Notifications description: Provide the email to which you will receive your call detail records. Choose the frequency in which you wish to receive these
Language Options Message: Choose your language options for your IVR. Example: For English press 1
Voice Menu Option Message: Choose your voice menu extension. Example: Accounting press 1
Custom extensions description: Add the phone number to which we should forward the voice menu. Example: Sales -> 305-898-7375
Audio description: Predefined audio is an audio automatically generated by Fancyy. You can also Upload personal Recording or buy a professional recording
Delete Message: Are you sure you want to delete this
